name: Eberhard Karls Universität Tübingen
goal: Excellent research - internationally networked, highly innovative, future-oriented; the university as a partner for research institutions. Teaching that is closely integrated with the research profile of the University of Tübingen; engaging programs of study that prepare students for academic degrees such as bachelor's, master's, professional examinations and doctorates.
interests: Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Education and training, External Relations, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: ERASMUS+, HORIZON2020, especially ERC, FET schemes, societal challences, preparation of HORIZON Europe.
